CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 335", Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 336" ), IF( AND( MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) = 2, DAY( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) = 29, NOT( OR( MOD( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 100 ) != 0 ) ) ) ), DATE( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) + 1, 3, 1), DATE( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) + 1, MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), DAY( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) ) ), IF( OR( Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 240A", Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 240B", Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 812", Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 814", Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 815", Citation_Form_Assessment_Conga__c == "BOFE 816" ), IF( AND( MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) = 2, DAY( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) = 29, NOT( OR( MOD( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 100 ) != 0 ) ) ) ), DATE( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) + 3, 3, 1), DATE( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) + 3, MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), DAY( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) ) ),null) )
CustomField.label: SOL Deadline
